(Simplified: 荞)
Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: A tall 喬 grass 艹; 喬 also provides the pronunciation
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 喬 [ qiáo ] tall, lofty; proud, stately
①(蕎麥)ａ．一年生草本植物，莖紫紅色，葉互生，三角形，開小白花；b．這種植物的子實，黑色，磨成麪粉供食用。
蕎麥 [ qiáo mài ]: buckwheat

蕎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiáo］
［《廣韻》巨嬌切，平宵，羣。］
“荞1”的繁体字。
荞麦。
[②]［jiāo］
［《廣韻》舉喬切，平宵，見。］
“荞2”的繁体字。
药草名。即大戟。

蕎字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蕎； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1057第27
【唐韻】舉喬切，音嬌。【爾雅·釋草】蕎，卭鉅。【註】藥草，大戟。【本草】其根辛苦，戟人咽喉，故名。　又【廣韻】巨嬌切【韻會】渠嬌切，?音喬。【玉篇】蕎麥。【本草】蕎麥莖弱而翹然，易長易收，磨麪如麥。【白居易詩】蕎麥鋪花白。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zhezi] 　qiao; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 1057 27
[Tang Yun] Giving Qiaoqie, Yinjiao. 【Erya·Shuicao】buckwheat, giant buckwheat. [Note] Herb, Euphorbia. 【Materia Medica】Its roots are hard, and the throat of the halberd is so named.　[Guang Yun] Ju Jiao cut [Yun Hui] Qu Jiao cut,? Yin Qiao. [Jade articles] Buckwheat. 【Materia Medica】The buckwheat stems are weak and straight, easy to grow and harvest, and the noodles are like wheat. 【Bai Juyi Poems】The buckwheat shop is white.
